import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs';
import { Sample } from '../components/Sample';

export const Template = (args) => <Sample {...args} />;

<Meta title="Example/MDX with Stories" />

<!-- HTML-style MDX comment -->

<Story name="MDX first story">
  <Sample background="orange">Test</Sample>
</Story>

<Story name="MDX second story">
  <Sample background="skyblue">Test 2</Sample>
</Story>

<Story
  name="MDX Story 3"
  args={{
    background: 'hotpink',
    children: 'Test 3',
  }}
>
  {Template.bind({})}
</Story>

<Sample color="purple">Standalone component</Sample>
